Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.render

Class ItemStackRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.renderer.tileentity.ItemStackTileEntityRenderer
      • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.render.ItemStackRenderer
  • public class ItemStackRenderer
extends net.minecraft.client.renderer.tileentity.ItemStackTileEntityRenderer
    This class is meant to apply a TileEntityRenderer to items. Using it is really straightforward:

    Add this to your item properties: .setISTER(() -> ItemStackRenderer::get)

    Then in registerClient call addRenderTile(TileEntityType, boolean)

    The required models will generate automatically if you're using ItemModelProviderBase.

      • addRenderTile

        public static <T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity> void addRenderTile​(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntityType<T> teType,
                                                                                 boolean readBlockEntityTag)
        Registers a Tile Entity Type to be rendered with the ItemStackRenderer.
        Parameters:
        teType - The Tile Entit Type.
        readBlockEntityTag - If this is set to true and an item has a BlockEntityTag, the tile entities read method will get called before rendering.
